title: Textile, 1917–18
medium:
Medium: cotton warp and linen weft
Technique: printed
markings: Printed on selvedge, "American Ouvroir Funds, 687 Fifth Avenue, New York"
dimensions: Warp x Weft (both selvedges): 163.5 x 82 cm (5 ft. 4 3/8 in. x 32 5/16 in.)
description: Textile printed in red, white, blue, buff, grey, etc. commemorating French and American friendship groups in oval medallions, with Statue of Liberty in center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1917–18.
1917–18. Medium: cotton warp and linen weft
Technique: printed. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-4.
